website_summaries.verdict: If you've been hoping for a fully-fledged flagship phone with all the bells and whistles of the the other elite mobiles just in a more compact size, prepare to be disappointed. The Galaxy S5 Mini matches the regular S5 in name and looks, but not in specs. If you're after a comfortable to use phone with the Samsung name and enough power for everyday use, it'll suit well. For a true compact flagship, look towards Sony's Xperia Z3 Compact.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy S5 Mini has the same rubberised design as its full-size brother, it's waterproof, with a vivid screen and decent camera
cons: Like all of Samsung's previous smaller flagships, the S5 Mini seriously waters down the specs of the top-end phone, meaning it's just a mid-range phone with a flagship name and high price
The plastic design feels far less luxurious than the metal HTC One Mini 2 and the fingerprint sensor rarely works as it should

customer_reviews.title: You sell cellphones as brand new when they aren't
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this phone on November 2015 I expected to be brand new. A week ago it started to be really slowly and wasn't working like it used to. So I decided to do a data factory reset, after that the phone didn't work anymore, it only works with WiFi, I can't make or receive calls, my phone is always on "emergency calls only" mode. I realized that the IMEI code wasn't the same that appears under de battery of the phone, so it turns that the phone is a refurbished phone. It doesn't work anymore, I hope an explanation for this. You sell cellphones as brand new when they aren't
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Coromoto Lugo

customer_reviews.title: great phone for the first 11 months
customer_reviews.text: great phone for the first 11 months. At around 12 months, the screen started "glitching" and eventually just went black or on occasion would make a plaid pattern. Being an international version, there is no warranty, unfortunately. I enlisted the assistance of different tech blogs to see if we could remedy the problem, to no avail. The phone features were great, but the phone itself was not very sturdy. If you do decide to purchase this phone, be sure to get a sturdy case to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Buy the S5 Mini it has a SD Card
customer_reviews.text: Very, Very good phone. I encrypted mine so when restarting the login text is in russian but the keypad is in you native language. Just enter your password and you will be logged in. I am buying a second one just so I can do video call without having to go through a secondary app. Best part of all this device and all Samsung devices support 128GB SD card (don't believe the small print). I am trying to find a 256GB SD card to see if it works too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this Seller!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If i could give this 0 stars i would. Don't buy it. Phone worked for 5 montgs maybe then it started, battery drained like crazy, phone froze and crashed constantly. Tried everything google suggested including a full factory restore where i lost all my pics and videos due to the fact that my phone wouldn't do a back up. Not worth it. Thank Goodness for the amazing Amazon customer Service i sent this back and will be getting my money back!!!!! During the CS call i read up on more reviews and ALOT of other people had this happen as well!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great small phone

My wife needed a small phone that wouldn't be obtrusive in the pocket. I love the fact that one can get at the "guts" of Samsung's phones so easily. No nonsense and no issues getting the phone registered.

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I managed to borrow a German sim card ...
customer_reviews.text: First, at $259 this item should have qualified for free shipping but I was charged over $6 S&H. Secondly, the ad didn't state this was an international version which required a European sim card to make it work. I discovered this only when it arrived. Fortunately, I managed to borrow a German sim card from a distant friend to wake up the phone. Only then could I use an American T-Mobile sim card. That was a false and misleading ad. The phone itself is OK, I just didn't appreciate being put to all that trouble to make it work.

But be sure to check LTE frequency bands - as the European version will not get LTE signal in many regions. I had to return it because of this.

customer_reviews.title: Only got 40 days of happiness. Then it melted down
customer_reviews.text: Only got 40 days of happiness. Then it melted down. Started running very hot and blacking out at night while recharging. Started draining battery completely in about 1 hour. Required hard booting. Wiped it and rolled it back to factory settings. Replaced battery. All to no avail. Worst part is, if it had died 2 weeks earlier I could have returned it. O_o Searched online and found these problems to be common with this model (specifically the international version) :( Now forking out another $220 for the Moto G. Wish me luck!

customer_reviews.title: Works well with T-Mobile US. Great build quality, but glitchy performance.
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review. It's glitchy and crashes often. Has trouble with apps. Tried to install Pokemon Go and it took far too much effort. Now that the app is installed, it crashes constantly. Great phone. I was nervous when it said "Euro Sim Card Only" but so far, the only problem I've run into is that it doesn't work with US LTE networks. Data transfer speeds are good. Excellent ergonomics. It takes awhile to get used to the Android system, but aside from that I like everything about it.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in USA! Phone WILL NOT work ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not use in USA! Phone WILL NOT work on ATT 4G because it only shares one 4G band in the US. Will connect to ATT H+ (3G) only.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: This is some real bulls***
customer_reviews.text: 1. I didn't credit the phone 2. It was delivered late 3.the phone did come, but it came locked which means I had to pay to unlock it 4. The phone came with one sim port when it should have been dual sim This is some real bulls*** and no answers as to why it came the way it did
customer_reviews.author: Everette Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he loves it. He has MetroPCS and at first had some trouble with the Internet connection. After talking on the phone with Metro his phone now works perfectly fine. P.S used in the U.S (New York)
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to my mom for christmas she really ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my mom for christmas she really likes it she uses it for the basic stuff tho the camera is really low qualitty we set it up with AT&T and had no problem with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey R

customer_reviews.title: Came with 220 V charger, and not LTE.
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works so fine, but it doesn't work on LTE with T mobile,which is my carrier in the US. It connects to HSPDA+. You also should know it comes with a 220V charger and a usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: zammanbosun

customer_reviews.title: This is a fraud. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: awful. fraudulent. I ordered this phone over a year ago. Today, I arrived in Europe. The phone doesn't work. It's not an international phone. Jackasses

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 Mini G800F Unlocked Cellphone, International Version, 16GB, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteEnjoy the convenience of the ultra-slim and compact design while its protected from the elements thanks to dust and water resistance. Other Features include: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot, Bluetooth: v4.0, A2DP, EDR, LE, USB: microUSB v2.0, GPS: with A-GPS, GLONASS, Browser: HTML5, Messaging: SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, RSS, Li-Ion 2100 mAh Battery, Talktime: (2G) / Up to 10 Hours (3G)

8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus, LED Flash + Front-Facing 2.1 Megapixel Camera
